Description: The following statement contains a magic number: var options = new Options()              {                  ClockSkewSeconds = 60'                  LocalTimeOffsetMillis = 0'                  CredentialsCallback = (id) => credentialStorage.FirstOrDefault(c => c.Id == id)'                  ResponsePayloadHashabilityCallback = (r) => true'                  VerificationCallback = (request' ext) =>                  {                      if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(ext))                          return true;                        string name = "X-Request-Header-To-Protect";                      return ext.Equals(name + ":" + request.Headers[name].First());                  }              };
